mil7.2.10:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘makkaṭassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.2.10:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, makkaṭo vāsamupagacchanto tathārūpe okāse mahatimahārukkhe pavivitte sabbaṭṭhakasākhe bhīruttāṇe vāsamupagacchati;
mil7.2.10:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena lajjiṃ pesalaṃ sīlavantaṃ kalyāṇadhammaṃ bahussutaṃ dhammadharaṃ vinayadharaṃ piyaṃ garubhāvanīyaṃ vattāraṃ vacanakkhamaṃ ovādakaṃ viññāpakaṃ sandassakaṃ samādapakaṃ samuttejakaṃ sampahaṃsakaṃ evarūpaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ ācariyaṃ nissāya viharitabbaṃ.
mil7.2.10:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, makkaṭassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.2.10:2.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, makkaṭo rukkheyeva carati tiṭṭhati nisīdati, yadi niddaṃ okkamati, tattheva rattiṃ vāsamanubhavati;
mil7.2.10:2.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena pavanābhimukhena bhavitabbaṃ, pavaneyeva ṭhānacaṅkamanisajjāsayanaṃ niddaṃ okkamitabbaṃ, tattheva satipaṭṭhānamanubhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.2.10:2.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, makkaṭassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
